contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 16th day of October, 2013, the Petition for Exercise of King’s Bench and/or Extraordinary Relief and the Application for Appointment of Counsel are DISMISSED. See Commonwealth v. Reid, 537 Pa. 167, 642 A.2d 453 (1994) (hybrid representation not permitted). The Prothonotary is directed to, forward the filings to counsel of record.
